Two Russian BMPs exploded in the Avdeevsky direction - a video of stopping the assault of the enemy and the destruction of their armored vehicles was published by 47 separate mechanized brigade. More details about the situation in the Avdeevsky direction are told by the junior lieutenant Anastasia Blyshchyk-the presenter of the 47th OMB.

The fighters of the 81st UAEBR conducted the cleaning of Russian armor and positions under Bigorivka with the help of anti-tank mines TM-62.

The 60s and 63 mechanized crews showed joint work on the destruction of the Russian tank. It is interesting that the tank was protected by means of electronic wrestling, but the Ukrainian drone was equipped with a self -alignment system and did not interfere with it - the purpose was destroyed.

The SBU exposed six Russian agitators, including a blogger who worked for a traitor Medvedchuk, and a deputy of the City Council who wanted to escape to Russia. Meanwhile, our border guards detained eight state border violators who tried to escape to Moldova.

These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - junior lieutenant Sergei Lipko and Lieutenant Colonel Sergei Misyura.
